title: Matrixport Co-Founder Predicts 15% Bitcoin Correction Amid Market ‘Euphoria’
description: Daniel Yan, co-founder of Singaporean cryptocurrency services firm Matrixport, has predicted a potential 15% market correction for Bitcoin ($BTC) by the end of April. The prediction comes at a time in which the price of Bitcoin is moving closer to its all-time high near the $69,000 mark, after moving up more than 40% in a […]
